Lets import numpy to show we can import modules: 

```{python}
import numpy as np
print(np.__version__)
```
Now lets make an array:

```{python}
y=np.array([[0,1,2,3],
	    [4,5,6,7]])
print(y.ndim)
print(y.shape)
```
